name: Auld Reekie Guest House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean, bed comfortable, nice to have tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom was on the small side but clean with plenty of hot water and clean towels daily during our 6 night stay. Excellent breakfast choice, beautifully cooked and cheerfully served up by Rhona. We managed to park in one of the two spaces available on site, there are on street spaces, but it can be a bit tight during the working day. We walked into Edinburgh through the park, a lovely start to a day of sightseeing and museum trawling. A wonderful city, superb museums.
reviews.title: All round good experience

reviews.text: I 'phoned Rhona the day before we arrived to check if they had a vacancy and if so to advise that our arrival time was going to be after 11pm.
reviews.title: A most pleasant experience

reviews.text: She organized it for the room key to be in the outside key box ... all done without any deposit/payment being made.
reviews.title: frendly and nice place

reviews.text: Buses into the centre go past every ten minutes or so and the same back again.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B in Edinburg

reviews.text: There is a Laundromat a few minutes bus drive away along with numerous
reviews.title: Helpful to the last.

aka: Auld Reekie Guest House Edinburgh, Scotland
